title: Employ fewer workers if MRP is less than MFC

content.prompt: The last worker currently employed by a firm has a marginal product of 3 units per hour and is paid $20 per hour. Assuming that both the labor market and product market are perfectly competitive and that the product’s price is $5 per unit, the firm should do which of the following?
